Class SphereException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.sphere.sdk.models.SphereException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonException, SphereDeprecationException, SphereServiceException, SphereTimeoutException

    public class SphereException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Base class for all exceptions related to the SDK.
